trans-unit.source: Specifies the hashing algorithm that ASP.NET uses for forms authentication and for validating view state data, and for out-of-process session state identification.
trans-unit.target: Angir nummeralgoritmen som bruker ASP.NET for skjemagodkjenning og validering av visningen tilstandsdata, og utenfor prosessen tilstand identifikasjon.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) to help detect whether data that is used for forms authentication or view state has been tampered with.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET bruker en hash-basert godkjenning Meldingskode (HMAC) til å oppdage om dataene som brukes for godkjenning eller Vis statusen for skjemaer tuklet med.

trans-unit.source: The HMAC is generated when view state content is created, and the HMAC is checked on subsequent requests.
trans-unit.target: HMAC genereres når Vis tilstand innhold er opprettet, og HMAC kontrolleres etterfølgende forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The HMAC helps ASP.NET determine whether someone has changed data that is sent between the server and the client, but the data can be read by anyone as it travels through the Internet unless it is also encrypted.
trans-unit.target: HMAC bidrar til å finne ut om noen endret dataene som sendes mellom serveren og klienten, men dataene kan leses av alle som sendes via Internett med mindre det er også kryptert ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: By default, view state is validated but not encrypted.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er visningsstatus godkjent, men ikke kryptert.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MachineKeyValidation enumeration lets you specify the algorithm that ASP.NET uses to create the HMAC.
trans-unit.target: Opplistingen MachineKeyValidation lar deg angi algoritmen bruker ASP.NET til å opprette HMAC.

trans-unit.source: The default value is HMACSHA256.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er HMACSHA256.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> property with the selected algorithm to generate the HMAC.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET bruker verdien for den <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>egenskapen med den valgte algoritmen til å generere HMAC.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AES" name="AES" href=""></xref> (Rijndael) encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Angir at ASP.NET bruker den <xref uid="langword_csharp_AES" name="AES" href=""> </xref> (Rijndael) krypteringsalgoritme.

trans-unit.source: Choose this option if you want to encrypt view state in your Web application.
trans-unit.target: Velg dette alternativet hvis du vil kryptere visningsstatusen i webprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: If you choose this option, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey%2A> property will be used for encryption and decryption, and the `HMACSHA1` hash algorithm will be used with the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> property for validation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger dette alternativet, den <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey%2A>egenskapen vil bli brukt til kryptering og dekryptering, og `HMACSHA1` nummeralgoritmen som skal brukes med den <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>egenskapen for validering.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses a custom hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Angir at ASP.NET bruker en egendefinert nummeralgoritme.

trans-unit.source: The custom hashing algorithm can be implemented in any class that derives from <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm>.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert nummeralgoritmen som kan være implementert i klassen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: The custom algorithm is typically specified declaratively in the validation attribute of the element, in the format `alg:`*algorithm_name*.
trans-unit.target: Algoritmen egendefinerte er vanligvis deklarativt angitt i attributtet validering for elementet i formatet `alg:` *algorithm_name*.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to specify a custom algorithm in code, see the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationAlgorithm%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du angir en egendefinert algoritme i kode, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationAlgorithm%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationAlgorithm%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the <xref uid="langword_csharp_HMACSHA256" name="HMACSHA256" href=""></xref> hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Angir at ASP.NET bruker den <xref uid="langword_csharp_HMACSHA256" name="HMACSHA256" href=""> </xref> nummeralgoritme.

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: `HMACSHA256` is an SHA2 hashing algorithm that generates a 256-bit hash code.
trans-unit.target: `HMACSHA256`er en SHA2 nummeralgoritmen som genererer en 256-biters hash-kode.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the <xref uid="langword_csharp_HMACSHA384" name="HMACSHA384" href=""></xref> hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Angir at ASP.NET bruker den <xref uid="langword_csharp_HMACSHA384" name="HMACSHA384" href=""> </xref> nummeralgoritme.

trans-unit.source: `HMACSHA384` is an SHA2 hashing algorithm that generates a 384-bit hash code.
trans-unit.target: `HMACSHA384`er en SHA2 nummeralgoritmen som genererer en 384-biters hash-kode.

trans-unit.source: This option is available for applications that require stronger security than is provided by the `HMACSHA256`algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet er tilgjengelig for programmer som krever sterkere sikkerhet enn det som er angitt av den `HMACSHA256`algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the <xref uid="langword_csharp_HMACSHA512" name="HMACSHA512" href=""></xref> hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Angir at ASP.NET bruker den <xref uid="langword_csharp_HMACSHA512" name="HMACSHA512" href=""> </xref> nummeralgoritme.

trans-unit.source: `HMACSHA512` is an SHA2 hashing algorithm that generates a 512-bit hash code.
trans-unit.target: `HMACSHA512`er en SHA2 nummeralgoritmen som genererer en 512-biters hash-kode.

trans-unit.source: This option is available for applications that require stronger security than is provided by the `HMACSHA384` algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet er tilgjengelig for programmer som krever sterkere sikkerhet enn det som er angitt av den `HMACSHA384` algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the Message Digest 5 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_MD5" name="MD5" href=""></xref>) hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Angir at ASP.NET bruker Message Digest 5 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_MD5" name="MD5" href=""></xref>) nummeralgoritme.

trans-unit.source: `MD5` is a hashing algorithm that generates a 128-bit hash value.
trans-unit.target: `MD5`er en nummeralgoritme som genererer en 128-biters hash-verdi.

trans-unit.source: This option is included for legacy purposes and should be selected only if compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.NET is required.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet er inkludert eldre formålene og kan bare velges hvis kompatibilitet med tidligere versjoner av ASP.NET kreves.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the <xref uid="langword_csharp_HMACSHA1" name="HMACSHA1" href=""></xref> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Angir at ASP.NET bruker den <xref uid="langword_csharp_HMACSHA1" name="HMACSHA1" href=""> </xref> nummeralgoritme.

trans-unit.source: `HMACSHA1` is a hashing algorithm that generates a 160-bit hash value.
trans-unit.target: `HMACSHA1`er en nummeralgoritme som genererer en 160-biters hash-verdi.

trans-unit.source: This option is included for legacy purposes and should be selected only if compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.NET is required.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet er inkludert eldre formålene og kan bare velges hvis kompatibilitet med tidligere versjoner av ASP.NET kreves.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the TripleDES (<xref uid="langword_csharp_3DES" name="3DES" href=""></xref>) encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Angir at ASP.NET bruker TripleDES (<xref uid="langword_csharp_3DES" name="3DES" href=""></xref>) krypteringsalgoritme.

trans-unit.source: TripleDES is an encryption algorithm that is used only if you specify that view state is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: TripleDES er en krypteringsalgoritme som brukes bare hvis du angir at visningsstatusen er kryptert.

trans-unit.source: This option is included for legacy purposes and should be selected only if compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.NET is required.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet er inkludert eldre formålene og kan bare velges hvis kompatibilitet med tidligere versjoner av ASP.NET kreves.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
